2008 2010 |- !colspan="2"| Ties (2) |- |colspan="2"| 1962 1973 |- !colspan="2"| No Game (7) |- |colspan="2"| 1918 1923 1924 1943 1944 1945 1992 |} The '''Governor's Cup''' is a name given to the [[American football|football]] [[game]] between [[Brown University]] and the [[ University of Rhode Island]]. As of 2010, the [[Brown Bears]] and [[Rhode Island Rams]] have met 95 times beginning in 1909. The Brown-Rhode Island game is played in late September or early October, and the venue alternates between [[Brown Stadium]] and the [[Meade Stadium]]. As of 2010, Brown leads the series 67-26-2. [[Category:Brown Bears football]] [[Category:College football rivalry trophies in the United States]] [[Category:Rhode Island Rams football]]
